General.Name: Micro Digital Co. Ltd
General.Description: MicroDigital Co., Ltd. develops biomedicals based on ultra-precision optical technology. The company's products include Diamond, a fully automatic immuno analyzer for sample and reagent handling, iSBS, an integrated sample banking solution that automatically vacuum-seals samples; LuBi, a microplate luminometer that detects lights from chemiluminescent reaction within samples and measures the quantity of specific gene. It also offers Lumi, a single tube luminometer to quantify light emitted by chemiluminescence; Nabi, a UV/Vis Nano Spectrophotometer to measure cuvette and microvolume samples; Mobi, a monochromator-based microplate spectrophotometer that measures nucleic acid and protein quantitation. In addition, the company offers calibration and reconditioning and COVID-19 kits. Further, the company provides various Ubi spectrophotometer measurement devices, as well as offers various bioreactor devices. Additionally, it offers 3D disposable culture bags and consumables. The company also provides RnD Products. Micro Digital Co., Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is based in Seongnam, South Korea.
